title: Dr. Qanat's Ancient Irrigation Sabotage
description: Track Dr. Qanat, master of disguise and ancient engineering expert, across the world's greatest arid regions as he steals monitoring equipment from modern construction projects threatening historical water systems.

briefing.headline: Ancient water management systems are under threat!
briefing.narrativeHtml:
UNESCO Heritage Alert for Route Runners! Dr. Qanat, master of disguise from the Sourdough Syndicate's 'Ancient Systems Division,' has stolen hydraulic monitoring equipment from archaeological sites protecting ancient water systems!

His calling card: a bread-slice stamp and the message: 'These ancient irrigation masterpieces are being DESTROYED by modern development! My HYDRAULIC PROTOCOL will expose the engineering truth they're erasing!'

Intelligence Report: Dr. Qanat believes authorities suppress knowledge of ancient water engineering to justify destructive modern projects. He's stealing equipment to create an 'authentic heritage monitoring network' - but his shape-shifting abilities make him extremely difficult to track!

suspects.name: Dr. Qanat (Reza Mehrabi)
suspects.description: Shape-shifting archaeological engineer specializing in ancient hydraulic systems. Expert in qanat irrigation and traditional water management across multiple cultures.

rounds.clueHtml: Archaeological Intelligence: 'Dr. Qanat was spotted at an ancient qanat archaeological site in arid landscape, conducting field research on traditional water management structures. He's using water flow measurement devices and surveying equipment to document ancient desert architecture and hydraulic engineering systems that sustained civilizations for millennia.'

rounds.explainHtml: Archaeological Site Confirmed: Ancient qanat irrigation systems!
